summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the United States Department of Justice for financial assistance in the amount of One Hundred Thousand Dollars ($100,000) to support City Departments in planning, conducting, and evaluating weapons of mass destruction exercises; accepting the money when received; increasing the 2000 Budget of the Police Department; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
